reviews.text: The place has a character of its own.. very crowded and noisy during the public cultural events .. but very serene during the classical musical nights. You can enjoy all kinds of snacks at the stalls.. buy cultural artifacts and crafts of many different varieties.. the place has a lot to offer to everyone

Again a great place to take family and friends. Even locals go there to enjoy the cultures of all regions gathered in one place. Not just any place but the best places to visit. My family and friends who visit ALWAYS enjoy and appreciate the beauty that Pakistan has to offer and Lok Virsa is a great destination.

Personally, I've visited this place numerous times and still I prefer to take my GUESTS to this place for outing... it's very good place for youngsters as it provides an opportunity to explore our culture... here you can feel the taste of all regions of our beloved country and other countries of Asia like China, Iran, Tajikistan etc. STRONGLY RECOMMENDED...

One of the best Museum of Islamabad. You will see the representation of all most every culture of Pakistan. This museum is well maintained by the  concern department and I will to every local and foreigner tourist to visit Lok Virsa Heritage Museum. You will see Pakistani culture under one roof.

Heritage Museum also known as Lok Virsa Museum is a museum administered and managed by Lok Virsa - National Institute of Folk & Traditional Heritage. Heritage Museum is a museum of history and culture in Islamabad, Pakistan, located on the Shakarparian Hills showcasing the living cultures of Pakistan. The museum opened in 1974 and became an autonomous institute in 2002 following the Lok Virsa Legal Status Ordinance, 2002. The museum consists of several buildings as well as an outdoor museum which can accommodate up to 3000 visitors.

Description
Pakistan Museum of Natural History, established in 1976, is a public natural history museum situated in Islamabad, the federal capital of Pakistan. It has exhibits and galleries which display and provide information about the ecology, geology and palaeontology of the country. 
Situated at Garden Avenue, Shakarparian in Islamabad, the museum presents natural history in a fun and informative way. It has colourful and educational displays on various topics such as fossils, rocks, plants and animal species indigenous to our homeland.

The museum remains open on all days, except Friday, from 10am to 5pm. The entry is free for students and children under 12 while adults have to pay just Rs5 to enter. The reception area houses Virtual Orientation gallery. This electronic system provides information to students and the general public about the museum and the natural resources of Pakistan using touch screen technology. You can also see photographs and movies of wildlife, minerals, gemstones, fossils and rocks on these machines. 

The Pakistan Museum of Natural History has four divisions namely Botanical Sciences, Earth Sciences, Zoological Sciences and Public Services. The first three divisions are engaged in the collection, preservation, identification and research activities pertaining to plants, fossils & minerals and animals resources of Pakistan respectively, while the latter is responsible for mass education and popularization of the natural history through various displays, exhibits and dioramas.

It was a different experience, seen these things in Pakistan was amazing. 
Kids loved it and enjoyed it very much. 
They seen all galleries, they ask lots of sections. 
One thing they should consider it like make accessible for wheel chair.

This is one of the best place to visit. I have visited this place and I was like Wao this place is so beautiful and the things that they have kept inside the museum are antiques seriously. I would surely recommend everyone to visit this place and enjoy visiting here.

Awesomeness level. Must visit. Only 20 rs ticket for Pakistani nationals. 5 dollars for foreigners. But you have to visit it to experience its splendor. In such a low cost, very very informative and interesting collection of animals dating back to prehistoric times. Dinosaur gallery is awesome for children. You can also visit the largest whale ever caught in the world on the top floor. Very well maintained by government officials. Must Be appreciated for this

Quite an experience regarding some of the areas. I very much liked the reception area with information computerized booths. The peace symbol " Rock"  also attracts you. One thing you shouldn't miss if you have the kids is the dinosaur's area. It's not one of the best but better than before and still working on it.

This is a special artsy place in Bulawayo City Centre. You must visit the artist studios where you get an intimate feel of the beautiful art work while it's been made. The store there also have wonderful paintings so it's a great place  to purchase gifts.

Very difficult rating for me. Food was great. Place not very clean. A little dusting, a fan, ready waiters and easy to move chairs to allow customers to sit well would greatly improve the place. So its a place with great potential just not being managed properly.
Artwork is superb and people vibe is good during exhibition nights on Wednesday .
Real good place. Home of the limitless
It's a nice Quiet place to look at beautiful paintings and more art work

Beautiful place with awesome scenic views of beautiful Islamabad. Lush green areas hilly point  with resident monkey families. Totally completely hygienic atmosphere you can take breathe in pollution free air. However it's a beautiful lush green hilly point to enjoy picnic. Shops are available with drinks and edible items of traditional good and fast food.

Daman-e-Koh is a great place to visit, it gives a 360o view of Islamabad, it's a very beautiful place to visit for couples, families & friends. Wear comfy shoes as there can be lots of walking involved, some of it uphill with a few steps. You can spend all day here enjoying the scenery, live music & beauty of this place.

I love how natural the whole setup in the mountain is, its a beautiful view-point and is spacious with a perfect amount of greenry around you to really capture the whole mood. A great place to have a nice walk or an important chat with someone! WARNING: the Monkeys living here make it a little difficult to picnic but its okay

Daman-e-Koh is popular tourist attraction in Islamabad. From Daman-e-Koh, the view of Islamabad city is spectacular. It is therefore widely visited by people both during day and night time. There are tea and coffees shops, hotels as well as other stalls at Daman-e-Koh for refreshments. It has also wide parking space. #LetsGuide
Best place to go and relax. in the morning there is a different falvour in night is different very relaxing place peaceful. Go with your friends, family and love one.

It's a good picnic or day out spot for families and kids. Lots of rides, swings and play activity area for kids. Families can make a good picnic plan although didn't find any spot where one can BBQ. But at the same time day by day it's getting dirty as people are not taking care of it and you will see litter in play and Park area even when waste Bins are available. 
Secondly, I am very disappointed to see the there are no proper ramps for strollers and wheelchairs even when park is being maintained by government. 

Cleanliness and ease in movement for people on wheels is required on urgent basis.

It's a very nice place for children aged 5 to 14 years. It provides them with a number of physically challenging rides which are also a great fun to do. Surprisingly, it's well maintained too. A must go place for children who should be better accompanied by adults to watch, encourage and support them.

A nice place for people of all ages to get  relaxed. Children have many opportunities to play and pass their time in healthy activities. Slides, swings, horse riding options and many other structures for climbing are here for the children. A lush green lawn for everyone to walk or spend time.

The best park for kids at Islamabad 
Excellent place to go on closed holidays with Kids
Entry is Pakistan Rs 10 per adult and Rs 5 for kids between 5 1/2 to 12 years of age.
Kids below 5 are allowed free entry.
For adults, a walking track of approx 1300 Meters in length is also available.
Shops are available outside in the parking ad well a couple of them inside the park from where you can get snacks.

One of good park in town where lots of options are available for kid's physical n fun activities. Recently some improvement has been made in swings but still it requires lot of attention. Horse riding, jumping castle, flying boat like other entertainment options are available. Recommended for family fun time as well.

*It has 04 big gates from all 4 sides of the park
*The Biggest park in Islamabad Consist of Whole F-9 Sector.
*wheelchair accessible park but you need to bring your own.
*No enter fee & No Parking fee (both free 17 Feb 2019)
*Hugeness and greenery makes lots of landscapes and makes it so calm and beautiful No Rushy and noisy like small parks. 
*Kilometers of Walkways good for fitness.
*Sport complex inside,  amusement park for kids, bowling club,tennis 
  court, cricket,  football ground & much much more things to do
Best Regards
Best park of Islamabad. Wonderful location. Best views of Margalla Hills. Ideal place for foreigners. Offers good recreational facilities. Food quality is also good. Overall its a great experience.

Fatima Jinnah Park is a public recreational park situated within the Sector F-9 of Islamabad, Pakistan. It is named after Fatima Jinnah, the younger sister of Muhammad Ali Jinnah, the founder of Pakistan. Fatima Jinnah Park vast acreage is mostly covered by greenery, with a few man-made structures dotting the landscape. Most of the park area is effectively a wildlife sanctuary, except for a few areas of the park that are close to residential districts. The park is bounded by a steel fence with entrance doors placed at regular intervals, although only a few are routinely open and used.

A good place for a walk after work in Islamabad. Well maintained, clean, neat and tidy park.
Contains a jogging track, cycling track, a mosque, indoor gaming area and playground for kids.
Next to that there is a libray as well. You need a membership to borrow Books.
Amazing recreational park in Islamabad. Best for jogging. Lush green lawns add to its beauty.

A wonderful place in capital Islamabad. This landscape make the capital unique in the world which provides a good hilly area for hiking, tracking and camping. Hills are full of natural beauties and full if wildlife. Many species of birds can be observed here. Monkies, leopards, wild bores, different species of pheasants can be observed in the tracks. Dears, bears, snow leopards can also be seen here.

Recently I visited the margala hills with my college trip........ So hard to reach to the top of hills..... Patients of asthma and others with suffocation problems....keep their inhaler and medicine with them..... The hills are really beautiful to spend and enjoy your time.... You can have a beautiful view of the city from hills.....
Medium level mountains range, cover with greenery. There are trails for walking and hiking. Good place to explore.

Beautiful place located in Islamabad. Islamabadians this is the best gift to you from GOD,  perfect place for hiking and some extra curricular activities in Islamabad specially for those who are very interested in hiking or mountains traveler
One of the best place to visit in pakistan Margalla Hill Islamabad where u can see the entire city from the top.the beauty of the city attract people to visit here.

I have recently visited this place.... Most beautiful place to go.... A museum was also here which tells you about history of Muslim hero... History of Pakistan and also tells about the culture of Pakistan 🇵🇰.... The main beauty of Pakistan monument emerges out during night..... The lightning system make it most beautiful...... You can also take a look at city which is more beautiful at night.....

Amazing views. One of the good place to visit. 
Would prefer to avoid weekends as it can get very busy. 
Toilets aren’t so clean. However there are always cleaner try their best to clean but people!
If your are foreigner then please don’t buy ordinary ticket as there no where mention foreigner ticket price. 
I paid 250 PKR for 1 foreigner. Security guard  on the entrance  gate was very rude. Even though he knew I had foreigners with me. And he told me to not visit Pakistan again. 👎
Museum have good collection of history. 
There is a shop where you can get souvenirs and some snacks. 
Request to all Pakistanis. Please don’t stare when you see foreigners as they are not use to it.

Its built by my father's company later led by my mother. I know how the foundation of entire structure was laid. How the sweats of hard working labour turned the concept of monument into a reality. The construction engineering accompanied by an outclass architecture is itself a marvel. I hope the monument remains here till the end of world.

A good place to perceive the history and idealogy of Pakistan. Well designed and build but needed proper maintenance and cleaning. Must carry an umbrella and water if visiting during the day in Summer. Still it is better to visit in evening.

The Pakistan Monument is a national monument and heritage museum located on the western Shakarparian Hills in Islamabad, Pakistan. 
The monument, shaped as a blooming flower, is constructed to symbolize the unity of the Pakistani people. Its elevation makes the monument visible from across the Islamabad-Rawalpindi metropolitan area and is a popular tourist destination.

It's not the Table Talk I once knew. It used to be my favourite place. I visited it today after 2 years. Found the interior to be shabby , upholstery - dirty, food (sirloin steak with baked potatoes) wasn't hot. I was really disappointed !!!
Good food. Nice soup and salads. Excellent host.
Nice place and good food

Love this place! Everyone is extremely friendly. Extremely accommodating as well. Made us quite a few vegan friendly options on request. Have a great selections of books for sale. Definitely worth visiting

Visited yesterday...ordered Thai chicken soup, chicken corn soup.... Very bad taste
Then chef special Penne pasta was OK... Too salty... N fudge brownie with ice cream was terrible...like really terrible...
Service was zero... Waiters took their own sweet time...😕

I went today for facial and highlights. I am so impressed with their staff and their hospitality. Their staff was so friendly and they did everything so good. I suggest everyone to give them a try I swear you wont regret it.

Thank you team Allenora Islamabad salon! I have had a really wonderful experience . It was just fantastic. Not exactly what I was hoping for, but much more than that ! It really was an amazing afternoon. Thank you so much for the fantastic facilities and such professional staff. .     It was really nice to see your attendants on their toes all the time with a wide smile on their faces while dealing with clients. The treatment service was remarkable and really helped me relax physically as well as mentally. The friendly environment and calm aura of this place is a real treat to ones mind on its own. I just loved it altogether.  In addition to that the kind turn you did to me will never be forgotten and remain cherished forever. . Can't wait to make another visit soon again and will highly recommend it to my friends!
Was amazing..ALISHBA did a grt job in facial and Ruby did my hair dye had an amazing expecience!! Thank u all

i had hair dye and stricks from allenora islamabad. owesome hair dye and stricks .other saloons used to use fake local colours they use imported ones and they are v reasonable .best saloon in respect of hair dye and bridal makeup..
best hair dye at very reasonable prices! just love it

For almost two decades one of the best places for baked goods.
Cakes pastries cookies and desserts... All world class. 
Picked up a birthday cake made to order. Not just delicious but a work of art! 
Sandwiches are great. With the home-made taste.
Assortment of breads. Grain Bread though remains the favourite!
Now with a range of Potato crisps and ice-cream.... Which haven't tried as yet. But I am sure they are great in taste.

Ordered the grilled steak burger. The beef patty was too hard for human teeth. Told the manager and he said "grilled steak hard hi hota hai".. totally disappointed. They even included that burger in the bill .

Kitchen Cuisine... Yummy desi food. A must try when in a mood for desi cuisine. Other menu items are  equally good. Once in f10 a must try. On The way out do buy something from their bakery... Anything would do... as there is nothing they don't Know how to do... From baking to cooking. Keep Up the good work kitchen cuisine Team. I didn't take many pictures as I feel they won't do Justice to their good and scrumptious food.
Some nifty bakery items.  The cakes are almost the best in town. KC Grill does not impress as much.
Amazing experience. Bonanza platter and Mexican beef fillet steak were delicious. Cordial service and cherry on top was discount on Standard Chartered CC.

One of the best Pizza Huts in the area. First folks in so the buffet wasn’t completely out yet. Though the food that was, was absolutely delicious & hot. Staff was friendly & on top of things. Restaurant was pretty clean & well organized.
SO so ummy...and I love supporting young readers -- thanks, Hut! ...did I mention how very yummy the pizza was? Seriously. Good pizza 🥰
Love their pizza! It's the best anywhere. The service at this one is amazing, too!
Food was good and so was the service. Waitress was great also!
Pizza hut has been always the best pizza and love the salads and sauces. Great services as well.
Honestly, one of the worst meals I've ever had. Like a bad microwaved dinner.
Luved it

The service and the food were both great. Our server's name was Jodie, and she never let my glass or my breadsticks basket go empty. She was friendly, and gave me suggestions when I didn't know what to order. I tried the unlimited pasta lunch, and paid extra for shrimp. It was delicious, and definitely worth it. I love the peach tea they have here too. I got the chocolate lasagna dessert to go because I was stuffed. We still have lots of leftovers for dinner. Will definitely go here again.

Waitress was one of the best I've ever had. She was on point with everything from the time we were seated, drinks,appetizers,meal she killed it all around. Definitely recommend this place an will return again myself.

I placed an order to go via the phone. When I arrived, there was plenty of handicap parking. I was greeted promptly when entering the restaurant and they immediately went and got the order. to put it on the counter and as she showed it to me to verify the order was correct, she placed it in the bag. it was a nice and smooth experience and I will definitely be going back. The food was very good as well.
Our server Lindsey was amazing. She was always close by and she gave us good suggestions. Was excellent service by far
Food was really good.   The server was amazing!! So well mannered and made sure we always had everything.

Excellent food, professionally sound staff. It is a perhaps the most favourite restaurant with visitors in Islamabad. They are keeping their taste constant and their quality high for many decades. This restaurant is a landmark of Islamabad.

It's setup is mostly basic. Food is first class. Service is polite and efficient. Only thing is some other pathan boys eating at another table kept looking at me. That couldn't be helped as I was the only lady eating alone, and pathans being primarily meat eaters are red blooded. It was broad day light so I just ignored comfortably. However for evening time if you like me,   decide to enjoy their great food , then eat in the car
Clean and fresh food. Good staff. Very reasonable rates. Wait time on weekends is a bit long though
Kabul is a great restaurant. The location is right in the middle of Islamabad and the foood is very good. The service is just ok not that good but a place you must visit.

I'm a regular at this restaurant and would recommend it to anyone. It's got quite a significant foot fall so don't be surprised if you have to wait. I think they're the best when it comes down to taste compared to other places. Definitely get the kebab and tikkahs

Definitely authentic Chinese food. If you don't have the heart for it then don't come here. The food was great and the service was quick. They also had a fun karaoke station which made the experience all the more better

It has been my favorite for years now for their authentic Chinese flavors. I used to go here every weekend before I moved to a different city. 
But there is so much they need to improve.
1) Cleanliness, it's a major issue here. I always have to ask for my cutlery to be cleaned before I start eating. You will also notice that the wooden chopsticks are washed and put back on tables for reuse (ewww). Bathrooms are always filthy and never have soap or tissues available.
2) My husband peeked into the kitchen and then Refused to eat, since the cooks were cooking without any gloves or hair covers.
3) They don't take cards and you have to carry cash.

Also, they have Chinese Rice wine and Murree Beers available, in case you wish to order.
P.S. stags are not allowed.

As tonight was Chinese New Year, I thought it would be a good idea to celebrate with authentic Chinese food! But unfortunately, I have mixed feelings about this experience at Dumpling Zhang.

The first thing you notice when entering the restaurant is that many customers were smoking inside the room, making it hard to breathe and very unpleasant to experience when you don't smoke cigarettes. 

I ordered fried rice with chicken and boiled dumplings with vegetable filling, and both were served in rather good quantities. The taste was good but it was very disappointing that the Dumplings were lukewarm instead of very hot as they are normally served.

The overall experience was disappointing, and the bill at 1200PKR a bit high considering the venue, smoke and lukewarm dumplings.
They have such an incredible food, bit hard to find it on Google.
Nice restaurant. Hot pot is a real cool thing for a company

Tehzeeb is a Premium Bakery. They have many outlets in twin cities of Rawalpindi and Islamabad. 
There is different sections of bakery, confectionery, fried items, Salad bar, Burgers and Live Baking etc. 
Salad bar is just out of this world. You find some Premium quality fruits used in salad. Pizza is another specialty with some unique topping options like Grilled Chicken is one of them.
Environment is very neat & clean. They have free sampling tasting of different freshly baked items for all day. Prices are little high if compared with market but when you compared quality then no one can beat Tehzeeb. Freshly baked cookies are just mouth melting.
Usually you have to wait on billing counters. They accept all types of cards for payment.

Tehzeeb bakers are definitely the most amazing bakers and confectioners in twin cities of Rawalpindi and Islamabad. Food quality is amazing usually with a few exceptions though. Very popular amongst the people here and visitors. Highly recommended from my side!

Home delivery would remarkably enhance their penetration chances amongst local masses but so far they haven't opted for this business option.

Nice place with variety and quality. They have fresh preparations of cakes, shakes, ice creams, salads, bread n biscuits, snacks, appetizers, samosas and much more. They are able to maintain taste, quality and freshness. Love their place and food. It's nice and clean. People love to buy from there, that's why always busy.

Tehzeeb being an Urdu word is quite self explanatory that rightly expresses culture and heritage. It's a famous confectionery in Islamabad and Rawalpindi offers sweet delicacy and Baker items. Enormous range of delicious products available here. French hearts and cheese sticks are must try sweets.

Needs more variety of salads. Fresh cakes and biscuits. Bad pizza. Their customized cakes are good too. One of the good things is prices are not very high and quality has been maintained throughout. 
The newly introduced grilled cheese panini is quiet a delight to have. 
Customer service can be improved a little. The servers do-not know enough to guide properly.
A must try for lovers of Lebanese / Middle eastern cuisine. Excellent..
lovely place. very well decorated
Nice place nice location well maintained pleasure place
Would prefer again. Good food
Nice opportunity for people to  take meal as per their choice and taste

Food is Ok I guess... I have eaten much better food at much less prices. But rooms are good, and if you are staying here, then enjoy the food. Ambiance is quite nice. People are nice and courteous. Location is very good. Much to see and explore nearby...

My favourite place to hang out is the Nadia Coffee Shop offering a spectacular variety of cuisine for buffet dinner and the Sunday brunch. Good quality food makes it difficult to differentiate between various items. The sweet bar offers a lavish variety of rich sweets. Every visit is worth it

A high standard hotel facility with multiple facilities within one roof.
The restaurants are great dine in facility for food lovers. Nadia cafe / coffee place serves multiple cuisine for all trade of life personnel. 
Gym has been a place with all sort of equipment.  Swimming pool is also good with good standardised facilities. Common room has all type of facilities.
Business executive lounge has been comfortable.
Hotel has good rooms for multiple categories. The room service is quick and hospitality is appreciable. 
Security of area is well maintained .

View is amazing from room window . Staff is helpful and they give me late checkout without additional charges. Rooms are clean. They setup huge buffet breakfast which is available till 10.30am.
Though out door swimming pool is small but they have huge indoor swimming pool which is also temperature controlled.

They've got great restaurants. I'd definitely recommend anyone to go have their buffets. Just be a little vary before hand because they may have a special theme for food. Dynasty is great too and also zigilonis
Nice fresh bakeries, they make gluten-free bread by order
A mixture of fresh bakery items.  Would find variety of those homemade breads which aren't otherwise available in other bakeries.
Mjs is my go to place for daily bread and breakfast goodies. no one does better croissants than MJs.

To keep their brand alive and popular they should remain more strict to freshness of food and careem quality selling on counter. Currently it's not the case that's why I mentioned. let me check the quality of organic eggs I bought from them to comment later.
Quality at a reasonable price
Nice fresh bakeries, they make gluten-free bread by order
A mixture of fresh bakery items.  Would find variety of those homemade breads which aren't otherwise available in other bakeries.
Mjs is my go to place for daily bread and breakfast goodies. no one does better croissants than MJs.

To keep their brand alive and popular they should remain more strict to freshness of food and careem quality selling on counter. Currently it's not the case that's why I mentioned. let me check the quality of organic eggs I bought from them to comment later.
Quality at a reasonable price
Good food, helpful staff, music of your choice, shisha and comfortable seating arrangements
this place is good for having fast food, good taste.
The place has been moved from here to  G11-2
An average cafe but is still developing
Cozy place.
Excellent food in a crowdy atmosphere. Overall perfect quality but for a quite high price. However still total recommendation!
Really nice. Good food. Nice location. Fast service
Many small dishes, excellent food an d environment. Pricing medium range.
Mouthwatering menu, however portions seem to be not hearty enough.
Ok

A good place to be in for a lousy evening. I had been in Habibi twice and the food was yum each time! It's a very popular place among students at Warwick, so worth checking it out. The seating upstairs is quite cozy. A good place to be in for people planning to dine in groups, as some of the food on menu comes as sharer! I will strongly recommend this place. But the waiting time could be a bit longer and the bills can be a bit pricey depending on how much your budget is.

The food was amazing (like, seriously). We sat in the outside tent, which is really beautiful and makes for a good experience on top of the good food. Portions are on the smaller side, so order accordingly.
What a discovery! Probably the friendliest restaurant we've ever visited. Beautifully cooked Palestinian food at a reasonable price with full vegetarian and vegan choice.
Great food but portions tend to change. Love the service provided and the decorations.

Great place to eat.
Great hospitality and service from the owner and one of the best Arabian restaurants in Midland.

Great food.. Cozy Ambiance.. Must go place..
Be it Dine-in, Take-Aways, Birthday Celebrations, Anniversaries, Couple's B'day Celebrations Hot Plate, F-10 Markaz is the place to go..
Good food and ambiance with very reasonable price. Located in f10 markaz. Efficient staff.. calm place
Its was very hot :-P
I’m always satisfied when I order from them!! And the delivery time is amazing!!!
Extra. Good. Pizza. And good deals. Too
Very good pizza and excellent customer service.

Traveling through Colorado we stayed at state park near by for 2 weeks. Had pizza from these guys 5 times and I have to admit they made great pizzas every single time. Pizza made to perfection. Best Domino's pizza I ever had. Give them a try you see what I mean
So good best pizza in the vally took kinda long but so worth it
Disappointed.
very bad
Good but little bit high prices
Its ok
Cd
Food is average. Quality has definitely gone down over the years.
Nice views around💖

A cosy environment for niche crowd. Good place for small families n couples. Lowly lit that makes it more cosy. Slightly more expensive than the rest of restaurants in its category. A full entree with a drink can cost up to 1400 at average.
Beautiful place
This restaurant is very expensive, food is good but don't worth the price. Service is excellent.
Its very peaceful and mind refreshing places, and mostly people are like to visit for catching SunSet 🌇 view.
It has the best view of lake with alot of greenry and margalla mountains and you can also get close to the water here.....love this place
Nice Place for At Evening time with friends or Family, and also u can enjoy BBQ,
Best place for camping and hiking. The sunset view is amazing
Such a good place for outing.
